title: Why is master yi getting such a big nerf?
body: Why? He has less then 50% win rate anyways in plat + . So why nerf him so hard? His early clear is so damaged now. They should cancel the nerfs.

replies.body: you clearly dont see yi 1v5 so easily often
Ya because i am not in iron...
yi is aids and needs a rework. too simple of a champ for such high reward

make his alpha a skill shot
give it more impact

BAM instantly balanced in high elo and no longer 1v9 in low elo
The previous changed made him a terror in extremely low ELOs, this is just riot likely giving up and soft deleting him, years overdue.
